description: Housed in the elegant Relais Villa Flora, this restaurant occupies a natural terrace with breathtaking views of the Nissene hills. The dishes are predominantly regional in style yet reinterpreted with a modern twist. There’s also a good wine selection with a focus on Sicilian and Italian labels.
